text: Bichon is the name of several usually small dogs. Officially, they include: * Bichon Fisé * Bolognese * Havanese * Maltese * Coton de Tulear * Löwchen Two breeds that are also part of the group (but which aren't recognised by the FCI) are: * Bolonka Franzuska * Bolonka Zwetna Category:Bichon
title: Bichon
